attributes.action: award a knighthood to Geoff Brown, Chairman of St Johnstone Football Club for his services to Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to reward Geoff Brown with a knighthood for his service to Football in Scotland, St Johnstone Football Club and the people of Perth

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
